name: chimera-telemetria-sender-test
description: The tests for the chimera-telemetria-sender of EagleTRT

scripts.test:moduled: npm run test:moduled:compile && npm run test:moduled:start
scripts.test:partial: npm run test:partial:transpile && npm run test:partial:start
scripts.test:general: npm run test:general:transpile && npm run test:general:start
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:moduled:start && npm run test:partial:start && npm run test:general:start
scripts.test: npm run test:moduled && npm run test:partial && npm run test:general

author: Eugenio Vinicio Berretta <euberdeveloper@gmail.com>
